ótimo jogo, adoro o estilo de ww2, vale mais apena do que jogar algum cod de hoje em dia

Un juego muy entretenido si, como en cualquier otro juego online, sabes hacerte a su comunidad.

I'm sure this game was great when it came out, but now there is no reason to buy it with great free shooters like Counter-Strike: Global Offensive and Destiny 2. There aren't that many people online, and the gameplay is just average.
Great game overall but there should be atleast more crewable weapons.
un partage et un jeu simple
As a game of my childhood this simple formula works even without it being a nostalgic note.

Together with Fistful of Frags one of the best FPS games ever. An all time classic, but not suitable for easy-cheesy-noobs. Train your skills!

I have been play Day of Defeat since i was thirteen. It's one of the first *FPS* game I started playing growing up in my teens. I still to this day thoroughly enjoy it in my free time.

Armas iguais as vistas em filmes e documentários sobre a guerra contra os nazistas. os mapas descrevem bem a temática do jogo. A jogabilidade é melhor que o famoso Counter-Strike, permitindo você se deitar e com maior realidade nos movimentos.
player base is small because its an old game but still a great and fun game, use this sometimes just to practice my aim and warming up. 10/10
Good game, but the only people who play it are the tryhards with no lives. It's not a fun game to just play to chill out, because you will always get killed by these losers
Gran juego, que supera inlcuso al original. Esperando la segunda entrega. Recomendable 100%.

Gives me nice memories of younger me when i used to play this. It's really fun and should probably be played by more people. True classic

查询在线人数，过去一个月平均每天400人登录这个游戏。实际只有3~4个能玩的服务器，都被mod魔改的相当严重。偶见贴图错误，估计是游戏太老不兼容的原因。
僵硬的武器手感与移动，地图少，没有bot，打起来相当无聊。所有盗版的HL正作，包括CS1.6、物竞天择、胜利之日初代，都自带了智商不错的bot，唯独正版每一作都没有bot，V社总给人一种正版体验不如盗版的感觉。
鬼服+无纯净原版服务器+没有bot，就算你只是下载来怀旧也很困难。我打了好评，纯粹是出于对逝者的尊重，而不是因为这具尸体值得花钱观赏。

[h1][b] MY REVIEW ABOUT THIS GAME [/b][/h1]

I suggest to fix the viewmodel, crosshair, and bugs that are still in the game
and I suggest you also add bots to play offline and fun games
also add world war 2 mode for offline mode
